import React from "react"; const OrderDetailInfo = (props) => { const order = props.order; return (
Customer

{order.user.name}
{order.user.email}

Order info

Shipping: {order.shippingAddress.country}
Pay method: PayPal

Deliver to

Address: Arusha
Ngaramtoni Crater
P.O Box Arusha Tz 1234

); }; export default OrderDetailInfo;
